label: 百練抄(百錬抄)
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This anonymous history written in the late Kamakura era covers the period from 968 to 1259. Although the extant text lacks the first 3 fascicles, it contains valuable information concerning the political and social life of 13th c. Kyoto.
